addCriteriaItem

public static ViewCriteriaItem addCriteriaItem(DCBindingContainer bc,
                                               java.lang.String itemAttrName,
                                               ViewCriteria vc)
Add a criteria item to the View Criteria. The item name can be fully qualified to the View Criteria Row that it is supposed to be inserted. The fully qualified name can be obtained from calling getRootCriteriaRelativeName API on the nested criteria.

Parameters:
bc - The reference to the binding container that has the search metadata
itemAttrName - The name of the attribute to base the view criteria item
vc - The View Criteria in which to create the criteria item
Returns:
a reference to the ViewCriteriaItem that was created

                                                         JUCtrlHierNodeBinding vci,
                                                         int index)
Public methods used by FacesCtrlSearchBinding as basic building blocks.

findOrCreateLovBinding

public static JUCtrlListBinding findOrCreateLovBinding(DCBindingContainer searchBC,
                                                       JUCtrlHierNodeBinding vci,
                                                       int index)
Find or create a list or LOV binding for the given node binding for a view criteria item.

Parameters:
searchBC - binding container containing other bindings created for the search binding.
vci - A JUCtrlHierNodeBinding for the view criteria item which a list or lov binding is to be created for.
index - if the VC item to be filled in by the LOV contains multiple values, specify which value is to be filled in.
Returns:
A list or lov binding, or null if either the control hint does not require a list or lov binding to be created, or if no lov name is defined in the view criteria item or its associated attribute.

setValuesFromListBinding

public static void setValuesFromListBinding(JUCtrlListBinding listBinding,
                                            JUCtrlHierNodeBinding itemNode,
                                            int[] selIndices)
Sets the values of a View Criteria Item to the values the user selected in a multi-select choice list.

Parameters:
listBinding - The list binding created to display the values in an lov
itemNode - The view criteria item hier node binding whose values are being set and displayed
selIndices - The indices of the items the user selected in the choice list

clearListBindingDerivedAttributes

public static void clearListBindingDerivedAttributes(JUCtrlListBinding listBinding,
                                                     JUCtrlHierNodeBinding itemNode)
API to clear the derived attribute values of a list binding

Parameters:
listBinding - The list binding whose derived attribute values have to be cleared
itemNode - The view criteria item hier node binding whose values are displayed in the lov

clearSearchValuesForItem

API to clear the search values of a VCItem

Parameters:
itemNode - The view criteria item hier node binding whose search values have to be cleared.

getNamedViewCriteria

public static java.util.List<ViewCriteria> getNamedViewCriteria(DCBindingContainer bc)
Returns a list of ViewCriteria objects defined in the VO associated with the specified DCBindingContainer. ### sjv - TODO: This should not wrap viewcriteria api. You should be able to bind directly to the VO api to get all named ViewCriterias. There should be no reference to impl classes here.

Parameters:
bc -
Returns:
List

getNamedViewCriteria

public static java.util.List<java.util.Map> getNamedViewCriteria(DCBindingContainer bc,
                                                                 LocaleContext locale)
Returns a list of Map objects. Each ViewCriteria defined in the VO associated with the specified DCBindingContainer is wrapped in a ViewCriteriaMap object. This is useful as the consumers who just need to get hold of ViewCriteria's properties do not have to exposed to ViewCriteria APIs as they can use the generic Map APIs to retrieve the properties. Also, it makes the ViewCriteria properties instantly EL-reachable. This is used by the Saved Search implementation as the view layer can directly update the ViewCriteria properties by going against the generic Map APIs.

Parameters:
bc -
locale -
Returns:
List
